subject: Re: [junit] Re: Error while using junit.swingui.TestRunner - ( Server - WebLogic )
msgSnippet: ... How odd, your errors indicate that Java wants to be using X11. Perhaps your JDK is misconfigured. Do other Java GUIs work? Regards, Rob
messageBody:
--- anand_73@... wrote:
> Could you elaborate on that ?
> I tried on my client machine and it works and I use Windows 2000 if
> that is of any significance

How odd, your errors indicate that Java wants to be using X11. Perhaps
your JDK is misconfigured. Do other Java GUIs work?

Regards,

Rob
